item.title: Potential Solutions for Harmful Deepfakes
item.description: Explore the growing threat of deepfakes and the ethical, legal, and societal challenges they pose. This in-depth article outlines practical solutions including AI regulation, platform accountability, detection tools, and media literacy to combat malicious synthetic media and misinformation online.
